Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the New York State Vehicle and Traffic Law to increase the criminal penalty for reckless driving when serious physical injury or death of a person results from the reckless driving.

Items.MatterName: Increase the criminal penalty for reckless driving when serious physical injury or death of a person results from the reckless driving.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to remedy several deficiencies in the law regarding leaving the scene of an accident.

Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature to remedy several deficiencies in the law regarding leaving the scene of an accident.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would lower New York City’s speed limit.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would lower NYC’s speed limit.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation increasing the penalty for driving on the sidewalk.

Items.MatterName: Increasing the penalty for driving on the sidewalk.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would allow New York City to lower its speed limit to 25 miles per hour.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Lower NYC’s speed limit to 25 miles per hour.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would give New York City control over its own speed camera program.

Items.MatterName: Give NYC control over its own speed camera program.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would give New York City control over its own red light camera program.

Items.MatterName: Give NYC control over its own red light camera program.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would make a violation of Hayley and Diego’s Law a misdemeanor.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Make a violation of Hayley and Diego’s Law a misdemeanor.
